text: Grant Almerin Tinker (January 11, 1926 - November 28, 2016) was an American television producer and executive. He was the former chairman and CEO of NBC from 1981 to 1986. He is the co-founder of MTM Enterprises. Tinker was the former husband of actress Mary Tyler Moore. After leaving NBC, Tinker tried to repeat his success with MTM Enterprises by forming GTG (Grant Tinker-Gannett) Entertainment but the business venture failed and the company closed in 1990. Tinker was born in Stamford, Connecticut. His parents were Margaret (n√©e Hessin) and Arthur Almerin Tinker.
